#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
int dp[1005][10005];
int temp[1005][10005];
int max(int a, int b)
{
    return (a > b) ? a : b;
}

int main()
{
    int i,j,N,T;
    cin>>N;
    int val[N+1],wt[N+1];
    cin>>T;
    for(int i=0;i<N;i++)
    cin>>val[i];
    for(int i=0;i<N;i++)
    cin>>wt[i];
    for(i=1;i<=N;i++)
    {
        for(j=1;j<=T;j++)
        {
            if(wt[i-1]<=j)
                {
                    dp[i][j] = max(val[i-1]+dp[i-1][j-wt[i-1]],dp[i-1][j]);
                    temp[i][j] = max(2*val[i-1]+dp[i-1][j-wt[i-1]],temp[i-1][j]);
                    temp[i][j] = max(val[i-1]+temp[i-1][j-wt[i-1]],temp[i][j]);
                }
            else
            {
                dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j];
                temp[i][j] = temp[i-1][j];
            }
        }
    }
    cout<<temp[N][T]<<"\n";

    return 0;
}
